0.2.name: wordpress/polzo-ogmeta
0.2.description:
Plugin insert open graph metadata on your WordPress site. The plugin still in beta, so please send bug reports to me by e-mail. If you want to help with the translation, write to the same e-mail, but with the notation "Translation [language]"

  • More information: Polzo.ru
  • See: OPG.me
